plugins.name: specsmith
plugins.description: Create and manage thorough implementation specs with discovery interviews, deep research, and phased execution. Use /specsmith new, /specsmith switch, /specsmith resume to juggle parallel work streams.

plugins.name: uispec-backend
plugins.description: Backend plugin for maintaining UI specifications. Syncs openapi.yaml, endpoint specs, and component patterns after API changes. Commands: /uispec-init, /uispec-sync, /uispec-validate.

plugins.name: uispec-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend plugin for consuming UI specifications. Reads specs to guide component development and API integration.
